Company: Company legal name from the vendor file.
Sector: TPI sector name used to join company and benchmark tables.
Region: Benchmark region slice. If exact region is unavailable the app can fall back to Global.
Scenario: Benchmark pathway label normalized to '1.5°C', 'Below 2°C', 'National Pledges'.
Intensity: Company emissions intensity value (company fact table).
Benchmark: Sector benchmark intensity value for a given scenario/region (benchmark fact table).
CBD: Cumulative Budget Deviation: trapezoid area of (company − benchmark) over a year window; negative is better.
Bands: Background fills: below 1.5°C (light green), between 1.5°C and 2°C (amber), above 2°C (red).
